column2: In a variant of this game, instead of "Do you have any aces?", you ask for an ace of a specific suit
column4: Ochos Locos, as its name suggests, is an Android app for this card came
column6: In a kids' game an unpaired queen is this; if you're holding it as the last card, you lose
column8: Hold the gin & deal 7 cards when 3 or 4 play this game instead of just 2 people
column10: In 1959 a championship for this card game debuted on TV, with Charles Goren providing the play-by-play
